nodes.text: The Defoliator Deployment Tank (DDT), also known simply as the Defoliator Tank, was a modified Armored Assault Tank designed by Neimoidian weapons developer General Lok Durd for the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. The DDT was first deployed in 21 BBY on Maridun. There, Durd demonstrated its effects on two B1-series battle droids near his outpost for Count Dooku.
